title: BATTLE OF BYWATER - Third Age Total War Gameplay
description:
Third Age Total War Gameplay - Welcome to the Battle of Bywater.  The hobbits return home after a long adventure, only to find it under threat.  Saruman and a small army of Ruffians seek revenge on the shire.  Frodo and his company rally fellow hobbits to take a stand.  Enjoy the battle.

More info about the Battle: http://lotr.wikia.com/wiki/Battle_of_Bywater  

Download the Battle:
Singleplayer - http://www.mediafire.com/download/7ykscu1zzpzjcd7/bywater_SP.rar

Multiplayer - http://www.mediafire.com/download/8zhny63blv1p9pw/bywater_mp.rar

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
